[HELP: plugin_name]: The plugin name must be a valid Python module name. Enter to continue...
[HELP: tool_name]: Name of the tool whose output will be validated. Enter to continue...
[HELP: tool_url]: Homepage (URL) of the tool. Enter to continue...
[HELP: criterion]:
Identifier of the SQAaaS criteria the tool validator fits best into. Check them out in the following links:
		- Software QA criteria: https://indigo-dc.github.io/sqa-baseline
		- Service QA criteria: https://eosc-synergy.github.io/service-qa-baseline
	  _Note_: there is a special option <qc_ALL> meant for validating common & simple tool stdouts, such as boolean values. Enter to continue...
[HELP: author]: First and last name of the main developer. Enter to continue...
author: Jane Doe
[HELP: author_email]: Email address of the main developer. Enter to continue...
[HELP: plugin_class_name]: Name of the main plugin class. Enter to continue...
[HELP: has_threshold]: Does the plugin require a threshold for the successful validation? (yes|no). Enter to continue...
[HELP: has_subcriteria]: Will the plugin report a list of subcriteria being fulfilled? (yes|no). Enter to continue...
